search

Class SearchBasedRecommendation

  • java.lang.Object
    • search.SearchBasedRecommendation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recommendation

    public class SearchBasedRecommendation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Recommendation
    Provide search based recommendation. Default timeout is 10 min. Default No of recommendation=15; Search LAN Continuously and rank search result based on CompareFiles.sort(List, FileInfoDatabase)
    Author:
    kamal
